column4: hey ya'll I have a problem with moving some themes I dl to the /usr/share/themes file, how do I do that, says the access is denied and cant seem to do it in terminal with cp

try moving the file through ur file browser rather then terminal
oh ,.,. add "sudo" (Without quotes) to the beginning of that command

this will give u root access make sure u dont do anything stupid
